duties_responsibilities.duty: Sell entire product line of nutritional/food supplement products to retailers/buyers and develop customer relations.
Frequently travel to evaluate and enhance sales, answer customer's questions, and handle customer service situations.
Prepare reports of business transactions, keep expense accounts, and collaborate with the sales team to expand and serve the customer base.
Identify areas of growth within assigned stores, set up appointments with retailers/buyers, and perform product demonstrations.
Conduct store inventories as needed and participate in sales representative meetings and annual meetings to achieve growth goals.
Support company policies, safety procedures, and maintain a clean work area.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree (B.A.) from a four-year college or university, and at least two years experience in the Natural Products Industry.
